Akpan, nke a mazikwaara dịka akassa, bụ yogọt ọka a gwakọtara agwakọta
Ngwaahịa nke nri Obodo Togolese ya na Beninese, a na-ewere ya dịka nri na-atọ ụtọ.
A na-eme Akpan site na ịgba ọka ọka maọbụ ntụ oka
A na-etinyezi ọka ahụ na mmiri ara ehi ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ice iji mepụta nri na-atọ ụtọ. Ụfọdụ akwụkwọ na-akọwa nri ahụ dịka yogọt nke akwụkwọ nri.
Nri a na-ewu ewu na obodo  Benin ya na Togo
Na Benin, a na-akpọ nri ahụ Akassa
O nwere obere ndị na-erikwazi nri a na France.
